title: What if there was an AP item that grabbed targets soul like Illaoi E for 2 seconds?
body:
I know what you’re thinking....’Why would anyone want this?’

Because skill shot mages can have a tough time landing their kit and the last iteration of {{item:3116}}  was so broken that riot gutted the slow.

In any case, I think it would be healthy if only the champ with the item can hit the soul. Other players can see the soul, but it won’t be targetable  or have a health bar like Azir soldiers. I say this becaue it would be busted if everyone could attack the soul.

I  think it would be healthy because the victom can still move and fight back, the only thing the soul would help do is make it easier for the mage to land thier spells. Maybe there could be a small damage amp if both the soul and the champ is hit by Aoe spell. Something like 10%.

Item
3300 gold

80 ap
20 cdr
passive: After hitting a champ with 2 auto attacks or spells, you pull targets soul. Hitting the soul transferes some damage to target. Hitting both targel and sould results in a 10% damage amp.


What you guys think?
